radiographic_examinations.findings: No intra- or extra-hepatic biliary ductal dilatation. The common duct is unremarkable. The main pancreatic duct is not dilated. Several small cysts are scattered in the pancreas, with two larger lesions in the head/neck and tail measuring 1.0 x 0.8 cm and 1.1 x 0.8 cm, respectively. Small bilateral pleural effusions. A cystic lesion of the mediastinum measuring 3.1 x 2.6 cm is seen. Small rounded lesions of both kidneys are consistent with small cysts.
